verses.verse: Thou shalt not raise <WH5375> <WH8799> a false <WH7723> report <WH8088>: put <WH7896> <WH8799> not thine hand <WH3027> with the wicked <WH7563> to be an unrighteous <WH2555> witness <WH5707>.

Thou shalt not follow <WH310> a multitude <WH7227> to do evil <WH7451>; neither shalt thou speak <WH6030> <WH8799> in a cause <WH7379> to decline <WH5186> <WH8800> after <WH310> many <WH7227> to wrest <WH5186> <WH8687> judgment:
Neither shalt thou countenance <WH1921> <WH8799> a poor <WH1800> man in his cause <WH7379>.

If thou meet <WH6293> <WH8799> thine enemy's <WH341> <WH8802> ox <WH7794> or his ass <WH2543> going astray <WH8582> <WH8802>, thou shalt surely <WH7725> <WH8687> bring it back <WH7725> to him again <WH7725> <WH8686>.

If thou see <WH7200> <WH8799> the ass <WH2543> of him that hateth <WH8130> <WH8802> thee lying <WH7257> <WH8802> under his burden <WH4853>, and wouldest forbear <WH2308> <WH8804> to help <WH5800> <WH8800> him, thou shalt surely <WH5800> <WH8800> help <WH5800> <WH8799> with him.
Thou shalt not wrest <WH5186> <WH8686> the judgment <WH4941> of thy poor <WH34> in his cause <WH7379>.

Keep thee far <WH7368> <WH8799> from a false <WH8267> matter <WH1697>; and the innocent <WH5355> and righteous <WH6662> slay <WH2026> <WH8799> thou not: for I will not justify <WH6663> <WH8686> the wicked <WH7563>.

And thou shalt take <WH3947> <WH8799> no gift <WH7810>: for the gift <WH7810> blindeth <WH5786> <WH8762> the wise <WH6493>, and perverteth <WH5557> <WH8762> the words <WH1697> of the righteous <WH6662>.

Also thou shalt not oppress <WH3905> <WH8799> a stranger <WH1616>: for ye know <WH3045> <WH8804> the heart <WH5315> of a stranger <WH1616>, seeing <WH3588> ye were strangers <WH1616> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>.
And six <WH8337> years <WH8141> thou shalt sow <WH2232> <WH8799> thy land <WH776>, and shalt gather <WH622> <WH8804> in the fruits <WH8393> thereof:

But the seventh <WH7637> year thou shalt let it rest <WH8058> <WH8799> and lie <WH5203> <WH8804> still; that the poor <WH34> of thy people <WH5971> may eat <WH398> <WH8804>: and what they leave <WH3499> the beasts <WH2416> of the field <WH7704> shall eat <WH398> <WH8799>. In like manner thou shalt deal <WH6213> <WH8799> with thy vineyard <WH3754>, and with thy oliveyard <WH2132>.

Six <WH8337> days <WH3117> thou shalt do <WH6213> <WH8799> thy work <WH4639>, and on the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117> thou shalt rest <WH7673> <WH8799>: that thine ox <WH7794> and thine ass <WH2543> may rest <WH5117> <WH8799>, and the son <WH1121> of thy handmaid <WH519>, and the stranger <WH1616>, may be refreshed <WH5314> <WH8735>.

And in all things that I have said <WH559> <WH8804> unto you be circumspect <WH8104> <WH8735>: and make no mention <WH2142> <WH8686> of the name <WH8034> of other <WH312> 'elohim <WH430>, neither let it be heard <WH8085> <WH8735> out <WH5921> of thy mouth <WH6310>.
Three <WH7969> times <WH7272> thou shalt keep a feast <WH2287> <WH8799> unto me in the year <WH8141>.

Thou shalt keep <WH8104> <WH8799> the feast <WH2282> of matzah <WH4682>: (thou shalt eat <WH398> <WH8799> matzah <WH4682> seven <WH7651> days <WH3117>, as I commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> thee, in the time appointed <WH4150> of the month <WH2320> Abib <WH24>; for in it thou camest out <WH3318> <WH8804> from Egypt <WH4714>: and none shall appear <WH7200> <WH8735> before <WH6440> me empty <WH7387>:)

And the feast <WH2282> of harvest <WH7105>, the firstfruits <WH1061> of thy labours <WH4639>, which thou hast sown <WH2232> <WH8799> in the field <WH7704>: and the feast <WH2282> of ingathering <WH614>, which is in the end <WH3318> <WH8800> of the year <WH8141>, when thou hast gathered <WH622> <WH8800> in thy labours <WH4639> out of the field <WH7704>.
Three <WH7969> times <WH6471> in the year <WH8141> all thy males <WH2138> shall appear <WH7200> <WH8735> before <WH6440> the YY <WH113> GOD <WH3068>.

Thou shalt not offer <WH2076> <WH8799> the blood <WH1818> of my sacrifice <WH2077> with leavened bread <WH2557>; neither shall the fat <WH2459> of my sacrifice <WH2282> remain <WH3885> <WH8799> until the morning <WH1242>.

The first <WH7225> of the firstfruits <WH1061> of thy land <WH127> thou shalt bring <WH935> <WH8686> into the house <WH1004> of the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430>. Thou shalt not seethe <WH1310> <WH8762> a kid <WH1423> in his mother's <WH517> milk <WH2461>.

Behold, I send <WH7971> <WH8802> an Angel <WH4397> before <WH6440> thee, to keep <WH8104> <WH8800> thee in the way <WH1870>, and to bring <WH935> <WH8687> thee into the place <WH4725> which I have prepared <WH3559> <WH8689>.

Beware <WH8104> <WH8734> of <WH6440> him, and obey <WH8085> <WH8798> his voice <WH6963>, provoke <WH4843> <WH8686> him not; for he will not pardon <WH5375> <WH8799> your transgressions <WH6588>: for my name <WH8034> is in him <WH7130>.

But if thou shalt indeed <WH8085> <WH8800> obey <WH8085> <WH8799> his voice <WH6963>, and do <WH6213> <WH8804> all that I speak <WH1696> <WH8762>; then I will be an enemy <WH340> <WH8804> unto thine enemies <WH341> <WH8802>, and an adversary <WH6887> <WH8802> unto thine adversaries <WH6696> <WH8804>.

For mine Angel <WH4397> shall go <WH3212> <WH8799> before <WH6440> thee, and bring <WH935> <WH8689> thee in unto the Amorites <WH567>, and the Hittites <WH2850>, and the Perizzites <WH6522>, and the Kanahanites <WH3669>, the Hivites <WH2340>, and the Y'vusis <WH2983>: and I will cut them off <WH3582> <WH8689>.

Thou shalt not bow down <WH7812> <WH8691> to their 'elohim <WH430>, nor serve <WH5647> <WH8714> them, nor do <WH6213> <WH8799> after their works <WH4639>: but thou shalt utterly <WH2040> <WH8763> overthrow <WH2040> <WH8762> them, and quite <WH7665> <WH8763> break down <WH7665> <WH8762> their images <WH4676>.

And ye shall serve <WH5647> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068> your 'Elohim <WH430>, and he shall bless <WH1288> <WH8765> thy bread <WH3899>, and thy water <WH4325>; and I will take <WH5493> sickness <WH4245> away <WH5493> <WH8689> from the midst <WH7130> of thee.
There shall nothing cast their young <WH7921> <WH8764>, nor be barren <WH6135>, in thy land <WH776>: the number <WH4557> of thy days <WH3117> I will fulfil <WH4390> <WH8762>.

I will send <WH7971> <WH8762> my fear <WH367> before <WH6440> thee, and will destroy <WH2000> <WH8804> all the people <WH5971> to whom thou shalt come <WH935> <WH8799>, and I will make <WH5414> <WH8804> all thine enemies <WH341> <WH8802> turn their backs <WH6203> unto thee.

And I will send <WH7971> <WH8804> shofarets <WH6880> before <WH6440> thee, which shall drive out <WH1644> <WH8765> the Hivite <WH2340>, the Kanahanite <WH3669>, and the Hittite <WH2850>, from before <WH6440> thee.

I will not drive them out <WH1644> <WH8762> from before <WH6440> thee in one <WH259> year <WH8141>; lest the land <WH776> become desolate <WH8077>, and the beast <WH2416> of the field <WH7704> multiply <WH7227> against thee.
By little <WH4592> and little <WH4592> I will drive them out <WH1644> <WH8762> from before <WH6440> thee, until thou be increased <WH6509> <WH8799>, and inherit <WH5157> <WH8804> the land <WH776>.

And I will set <WH7896> <WH8804> thy bounds <WH1366> from the Red <WH5488> sea <WH3220> even unto the sea <WH3220> of the Philistines <WH6430>, and from the desert <WH4057> unto the river <WH5104>: for I will deliver <WH5414> <WH8799> the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of the land <WH776> into your hand <WH3027>; and thou shalt drive them out <WH1644> <WH8765> before <WH6440> thee.
Thou shalt make <WH3772> <WH8799> no covenant <WH1285> with them, nor with their 'elohim <WH430>.

They shall not dwell <WH3427> <WH8799> in thy land <WH776>, lest they make thee sin <WH2398> <WH8686> against me: for if thou serve <WH5647> <WH8799> their 'elohim <WH430>, it will surely be a snare <WH4170> unto thee.
